Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya scored an unbeaten 39 while Varun Chakravarthy accounted for three scalps.
Sanju Samson failed to convert his start again but showed his class in his knock of 29 off 19.
Suryakumar Yadav departed on 29 off just 14.
Najmul Hossain Shanto played well for his unbeaten 35.
Arshdeep Singh came in handy and chipped in with a three-wicket haul.
Bangladesh lost half of its side within the first 10 overs.
Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav mentioned that the wicket looks good and the crowd has come in numbers.
Najmul Hossain Shanto said it is a pretty new side and hopes for the openers to do good.
Post-Match Reflections: Sanju Samson expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win.
Hardik Pandya and Mayank Yadav contributed significantly with their bowling performances.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went into 15 overs before a decisive home run by Hardik Pandya.
The target for India was not a big one, but the way they executed the chase was excellent.
